Summary: Four pulsating red orbs headed northeast, one after another.
divs: Sighting Details This incident occurred on Saturday August 10th at 10:05PM. I was walking my dog down the road I live on checking out the big dipper, when I noticed a light in the southwest sky moving. I stepped off the road so I could watch it approach. It seems a lot of aircraft fly with their landing lights on. I noticed no lights were blinking, which was unusual. As it approached I could see it was pulsating red, and seemed to be changing shape. It flew directly over my head to the northeast. I cant estimate its height, except to say it was not a real high like the aircraft that leave trails behind them. After flying overhead it went below the tree line to the northeast. After this I looked around the sky and noticed a distant aircraft in the far west with its usual lights blinking. Looking to the southwest I spotted another light like before and it took the exact same flight. That was number two pulsating red orb. This happened two more times. Thats a total of four orbs in less than ten minutes. I really dont know what to think of all this.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Alden
There were no other sightings in Alden on or around August 10th 2013
